column5: Me and a couple buddy's went up to port dover on saturday all that was caught was a oos smallie,so we headed up to mountsberg today my friend got three small pike.I got three perch and a two foot pike and we called it a day my other buddy got skunked both days.
Welcome to the board and nice report. By the way, this board loves to see pictures.
Welcome aboard! What Johnny Bass said.
Hey John!  Great report...and welcome to the board...I saw you commented on the OFC Anthem thread...so thanks for that.  Remember your camera next time!!!
I've got a couple pics on photo bucket how would i post them here?It says the file was larger than availible space?
John....in photobucket, just click on the IMG section of code and then paste it right in your report where you want the pic to show up.
